definition: Beijing and Shanghai
abbr. for Beijing/surname Jing/Jing ethnic minority
capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)
short name for Shanghai
Beijing-Shanghai High-Speed Railway, completed in 2010/abbr. for 京滬高速鐵路|京沪高速铁路

sentences.english: Passengers traveling on the line pay 555 yuan for a one-way, economy-class ticket between Beijing and Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 京沪高铁单程二等座的票价为555元。

sentences.english: The new line, he noted, was 'still in a break-in period.'
sentences.chinese: 王勇平指出，京沪高铁仍在磨合期。

sentences.english: Lawyers say judges in Shanghai and Beijing are better trained than they used to be.
sentences.chinese: 律师们表示，京沪法官的素质比过去提高了。

sentences.english: 'The malfunctions haven't affected the overall safety' of the rail line, the rail spokesman said.
sentences.chinese: 王勇平说，这些故障没有影响京沪高铁的整体安全。

sentences.english: The new CRH trains are expected to travel between Beijing and Shanghai in 2011.
sentences.chinese: 新列车预计在2011年在京沪铁路运营。

sentences.english: Will be started soon in the county of Beijing-Shanghai high-speed railway stations within its own boundaries.
sentences.chinese: 即将开工的京沪高速铁路在我县境内设有车站。

sentences.english: In Taishan Mountain, the transportation is convenient with the Jinghu railway passing by in the west.
sentences.chinese: 在泰山，交通便利的京沪铁路经过在西部。

sentences.english: I drew up the plan for that campaign too, which was also known as the Nanjing-Shanghai-Hangzhou Campaign.
sentences.chinese: 渡江战役也就是京沪杭战役的实施纲要是我起草的。

sentences.english: The Beijing-Shanghai line has just begun to operate, so there should be very few problems.
sentences.chinese: 京沪线刚刚开始运作，所以问题应该很少。

sentences.english: Besides the old Jing-Hang Grand Canal and the Jing-Hu Railway pass through here.
sentences.chinese: 另外，古老的京杭大运河和京沪铁路也途经这里。

sentences.english: Under the condition of 7 degree seismic fortifications, the design meets earthquake-resistant requirements of Beijing-Shanghai high speed railway.
sentences.chinese: 在7度抗震设防下，满足京沪高速铁路抗震设计要求。

sentences.english: The Jinghu Express Railway to be built measures 1260 kilometers long.
sentences.chinese: 将要建成的“京沪高速铁路”长1260千米。

sentences.english: Jinan is at the junction of the Beijing-Shanghai and the Qingdao-Jinan railways.
sentences.chinese: 济南位于京沪铁路线和青济线的交汇处。

sentences.english: Beijing-Shanghai high-speed 13 exit closely follows the Sanyo River Water Diversion Project.
sentences.chinese: 京沪高速十三出口处，紧依南水北调工程三阳河段。

sentences.english: Inaddition, Jinghang Canal and Jinghu Railroad crosses Wuxi.
sentences.chinese: 另外，古老的京杭大运河和京沪铁路也途径这里。
